title: The Human face of Indonesia
creator_credit: David Haythornthwaite, David Roberts, John Darling, Rob McAuley and Film Australia
brief_description: Consists of five programs that look at the lives of five very diverse people, each giving an insight into life in Indonesia today. Examines the trans-migration program, the plight of Java’s low income groups, the administrators of one of Indonesia’s poorest provinces and a Dalang man who is trying to keep alive his ancient Hindu religion where Islam is the official state religion.
